snippet.title: Shatter Remastered Deluxe - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Relive the award-winning classic that redefined a genre. Shatter returns in stunning 4K resolution running at 120fps, with a modernised UI, and multiple visual improvements. Re-experience the highly acclaimed original soundtrack, remixed and remastered in 5.1 surround sound. 

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1937230/Shatter_Remastered_Deluxe/
Website: http://www.shattergame.com/
